014package org.gbif.api.model.occurrence;
015
016import org.gbif.dwc.terms.DwcTerm;
017
018/**
019 * Defines the type of citable data download.
020 */
021public enum DownloadType {
022  OCCURRENCE(DwcTerm.Occurrence), EVENT(DwcTerm.Event);
023
024  private DwcTerm coreTerm;
025
026  DownloadType(DwcTerm coreTerm){
027    this.coreTerm = coreTerm;
028  }
029
030  public DwcTerm getCoreTerm() {
031    return coreTerm;
032  }
033
034  public static DownloadType fromCoreTerm(DwcTerm coreTerm) {
035    if (DwcTerm.Event == coreTerm) {
036      return EVENT;
037    }
038    if (DwcTerm.Occurrence == coreTerm) {
039      return OCCURRENCE;
040    }
041    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unsupported download type for term " + coreTerm);
042  }
043}
